section.heading: First Source employment; inapplicable.
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the requirements of subchapter X of Chapter 2 of Title 2 [ยง 2-219.01 et seq.] pertaining to government-assisted non-construction projects shall not apply to a Qualified Social E-Commerce Company receiving a benefit pursuant to this subchapter; specifically, ยง 2-219.03(e)(1), pertaining to government-assisted non-construction projects, and ยง 2-219.03(e)(1C), pertaining to hiring and reporting requirements in government-assisted non-construction projects.
